item.title: BROWN FORMAN CORP 10-K
item.description: BROWN FORMAN CORP, which is in the Beverages [2080] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 21, 2021 had 30235 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2021 - 285 instances net - 278 instances financial - 248 instances 1 - 211 instances fiscal - 206 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
